## FlowTableSelection.afterRemoveFlow() method

Transforms the current selection so that its intended boundary is preserved after the specified range was inserted.

**Signature:**

```typescript
/** @override */
afterRemoveFlow(range: FlowRange, mine: boolean): FlowSelection | null;
```
